doc.after: The habitat of the beaver is the riparian zone inclusive of stream bed The actions of beavers for hundreds of thousands of years not specific enough to verify in the Northern Hemisphere have kept these watery systems healthy and in good repair although a human observing all the downed trees might think that the beavers were doing just the opposite
